occurrences: ARVO PART 24 PRELUDES FOR A FUGUE
SOLITUDE On November 13, 1979 Arvo Part was expelled
GUITAR From 1938 to 1954 Arvo Part lived in Rakvere, Estonia.
TOMATO WITH SUGAR In 1993, after a 13-year exile, Arvo Part visited Estonia.
SMELL OF HOME Arvo Part Left the Soviet Union on January 18, 1980.
PERFECT SILENCE Arvo Part studied at Tallinn Conservatory
STONE Since August 1981, Arvo Part lives in Berlin.
